item.title: Smart Mirror
item.description: Several years ago I built a smart mirror to help keep track of the time, weather, and my TODO list for the day. It currently sits on my desk but may eventually be integrated into a mirror in either the bedroom or bathroom. It recently stopped working so I decided to use this opportunity to fix it, document it properly, and record the workarounds to all the “little nigglies” that came up in the course of the project.
